document.title: Pure mathematics (Extract)
document.citation: Simple English Wikipedia: “Pure mathematics”. Retrieved from https://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pure_mathematics on 22 Aug 2015.
document.body: Many fields of mathematics are driven and motivated by applications: They can be used to solve real-world problems, for example, in physics or engineering. In contrast, pure mathematics studies abstract ideas or it tries to make proofs more beautiful or easier to understand. [“Pure mathematics”]
